meanings.definition: In a manner that is strikingly impressive or sensational.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was spectacularly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed spectacularly on stage.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat spectacularly.
meanings.sent4: The athlete leaped spectacularly over the hurdle.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky spectacularly with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To a very great extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She worked spectacularly hard to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent2: The team spectacularly won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The chef spectacularly cooked up a storm in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The storm spectacularly raged outside, shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden spectacularly bloomed after the rain.
